conversation.text: I recommend 'Welcome to Sarajevo'. This film, set during the Bosnian War, features American and British journalists trying to report on the conflict while also encountering a local orphanage's impact on the war-torn area. It has a strong cast including Frank Dillane, Stephen Dillane, and James Nesbitt.
